title: Flashman at the Charge
description: “Hilariously funny.”— The New York Times Book Review “Great dirty fun!”— Grand Rapids Press “The most entertaining anti-hero in a long time… Moves from one ribald and deliciously corrupt episode to the next… Wonderful and scandalous.”— Publishers WeeklyThe fourth volume of memoirs in which Harry Flashman confronts destiny with Lord Cardigan and the Light Brigade. Part of the Flashman series, comprising Flashman , Royal Flash , and Flash for Freedom , among others, which explores the successful though scandalous later career of the bully in Tom Brown's School Days.
author: George MacDonald Fraser
